description: A comprehensive bootcamp covering frontend and backend web development technologies including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, React, and more.
Learn web development from scratch. Covers HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, MongoDB, and more. Perfect for beginners.
Explore the deeper parts of JavaScript that often confuse developers. Gain a solid understanding of closures, prototypes, and async programming.

course_title: React - The Complete Guide (incl Hooks, React Router, Redux)
description: Master React and its ecosystem. Learn about React Hooks, React Router, Redux, and more through hands-on projects and exercises.

course_title: Node with React: Fullstack Web Development
description: Build and deploy full-stack web applications with Node.js and React. Covers authentication, deployment, and best practices.

course_title: Advanced CSS and Sass: Flexbox, Grid, Animations and More!
description: Take your CSS skills to the next level. Learn about advanced layout techniques, CSS animations, responsive design, and more.

course_title: Vue JS - The Complete Guide (incl. Vue Router & Vuex)
description: Become a Vue.js expert. Learn Vue.js from scratch, including Vue Router and Vuex, and build real-world Vue applications.
Master Angular and its ecosystem. Learn about Angular CLI, Angular Material, RxJS, and build powerful web applications.
Learn React with Redux for state management. Build modern, complex web applications with React and Redux.

course_title: GraphQL with React: The Complete Developers Guide
description: Master GraphQL and integrate it with React. Build efficient and scalable APIs with GraphQL and Apollo Server.
